name: dry
description: A collection of snippets covering all of ExpressJs, Body-Parser APIs, GulgJs, GruntJs, React, EmberJs and Ruby on Rails, Rspec.
author: @dayogreats
readme: In software engineering, Don't Depeat Yourself (DRY) is a principle of software development, aimed at reducing repetition of information of all kinds, especially useful in multi-tier architectures. The unique thing about #dry is that you dont have to remember any shortcode. So just type and watch #dry suggest snippets to you.
